verses.name: Psalms 82:1
verses.text: God standeth in the congregation of the mighty; he judgeth among the gods.

verses.name: Psalms 82:2
verses.text: How long will ye judge unjustly, and accept the persons of the wicked? Selah.

verses.name: Psalms 82:3
verses.text: Defend the poor and fatherless: do justice to the afflicted and needy.

verses.name: Psalms 82:4
verses.text: Deliver the poor and needy: rid them out of the hand of the wicked.

verses.name: Psalms 82:5
verses.text: They know not, neither will they understand; they walk on in darkness: all the foundations of the earth are out of course.

verses.name: Psalms 82:6
verses.text: I have said, Ye are gods; and all of you are children of the most High.
